content.question: Suppose that  tester  is a properly instantiated reference to a  MyClass  object and  num  is an  int  value. Which of the following best describes the conditions under which the value of the instance variable  x  is unchanged as a result of the call  tester.updateX(num)?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
